HollowMod:FocusHealStart.NAME: Simple Focus
HollowMod:FocusHealStart.DESCRIPTION: Spell NL Vessel !F!:  Heal !M!. NL Exhaust.

HollowMod:CycloneSlash.NAME: Cyclone Slash
HollowMod:CycloneSlash.DESCRIPTION: Nail NL Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies.

HollowMod:DashSlash.NAME: Dash Slash
HollowMod:DashSlash.DESCRIPTION: Nail, [#00ECFF]Dash NL Deal !D! Damage. Gain !B! Block.

HollowMod:FastStrike.NAME: Fast Strike
HollowMod:FastStrike.DESCRIPTION: Nail NL Discard 1 card. Deal !D! Damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to !M! random enemies.

HollowMod:HeavyBlow.NAME: Heavy Blow
HollowMod:HeavyBlow.DESCRIPTION: Nail NL Deal !D! Damage and apply !M! Weak to an enemy.

HollowMod:HowlingWraiths.NAME: Howling Wraiths
HollowMod:HowlingWraiths.DESCRIPTION: Spell, Focus !F! NL  Deal !D! Damage to all enemies.

HollowMod:InfectedAttack.NAME: Infected Attack
HollowMod:InfectedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Nail NL Deal !D! Damage. Apply !M! Poison. NL [#FFA200]Infection 2.

HollowMod:RecoilStrike.NAME: Recoil Strike
HollowMod:RecoilStrike.DESCRIPTION: Nail NL Deal !D! Damage. Return a [#00ECFF]Dash card from your discard pile to hand.

HollowMod:VengefulVoid.NAME: Vengeful Void
HollowMod:VengefulVoid.DESCRIPTION: Spell NL Void 2: Deal !D! Damage to a single enemy !M! times. Exhaust.

HollowMod:WraithStrike.NAME: Wraith Strike
HollowMod:WraithStrike.DESCRIPTION: Spell NL Void 1: Deal !D! Damage and Apply !M! Weak to an enemy. []

HollowMod:ChannelNail.NAME: Channel Nail
HollowMod:ChannelNail.DESCRIPTION: Focus 2: at the beginning of next turn, gain 1 [E] and Draw 1 Extra Card. Exhaust.
HollowMod:ChannelNail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Focus 2: at the beginning of next turn, gain 1 [E] and Draw 1 Extra Card.

HollowMod:CloakDash.NAME: Cloak Dash
HollowMod:CloakDash.DESCRIPTION: [#00ECFF]Dash NL Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! Cards. Exhaust.

HollowMod:CornifersMap.NAME: Cornifer's Map
HollowMod:CornifersMap.DESCRIPTION: Ally NL Put a card in your Discard into your Deck, Discard a Card. Both cards are upgraded for the rrest of this combat.

HollowMod:DoubleDash.NAME: Double Dash
HollowMod:DoubleDash.DESCRIPTION: [#00ECFF]Dash NL Gain !B! Block this turn, and !M! Block next turn.

HollowMod:LifebloodCocoon.NAME: Lifeblood Cocoon
HollowMod:LifebloodCocoon.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Temporary HP each time you attack an enemy this turn.

HollowMod:SoulSplash.NAME: Soul Splash
HollowMod:SoulSplash.DESCRIPTION: Spell NL Focus 2: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, Draw a card.

HollowMod:AbyssShriek.NAME: Abyss Shriek
HollowMod:AbyssShriek.DESCRIPTION: Spell NL Void 2: Deal !D! Damage to ALL Enemies. You cannot play other Attack cards this turn.

HollowMod:CoiledNail.NAME: Coiled Nail
HollowMod:CoiledNail.DESCRIPTION: Nail NL Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. If the enemy is Vulnerable, Repeat this effect.

HollowMod:DescendingDark.NAME: Descending Dark
HollowMod:DescendingDark.DESCRIPTION: Spell NL Void 2: Deals !D! Damage to ALL Enemies. Exhaust.

HollowMod:DesolateDive.NAME: Desolate Dive
HollowMod:DesolateDive.DESCRIPTION: Spell NL Focus 4: Deal !D! Damage to ALL Enemies.

HollowMod:FallenFury.NAME: Fury of the Fallen
HollowMod:FallenFury.DESCRIPTION: Nail NL Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. If you are below 25% HP, Deal !M! times that amount instead.

HollowMod:GreatSlash.NAME: Great Slash
HollowMod:GreatSlash.DESCRIPTION: Nail NL Deal !D! Damage to an Enemy !M! times.

HollowMod:InfectedCysts.NAME: Infected Cysts
HollowMod:InfectedCysts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and apply !M! Poison to all enemies. [#FFA200]Infection 3.

HollowMod:PogoStrike.NAME: Pogo Strike
HollowMod:PogoStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. The next Attack or [#00ECFF]Dash Played costs 1 less [E].

HollowMod:PureNailStrike.NAME: Pure Nail Strike
HollowMod:PureNailStrike.DESCRIPTION: Spell NL Focus X: Deal 9 Damage to an enemy + !D! for each Soul Focused.

HollowMod:QuirrelsAssistance.NAME: Quirrel's Assistance
HollowMod:QuirrelsAssistance.DESCRIPTION: Ally NL A Random Enemy Gains Weak !M!. A Random Enemy Takes !D! Damage.

HollowMod:SharpenedNail.NAME: Sharpened Nail
HollowMod:SharpenedNail.DESCRIPTION: Nail NL Deal !D! Damage to an Enemy. If the enemy had Weak, Deal the same Damage to ALL other enemies.

HollowMod:VengefulSpirit.NAME: Vengeful Spirit
HollowMod:VengefulSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Spell NL Focus !M!: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy.

HollowMod:BaldurShell.NAME: Baldur Shell
HollowMod:BaldurShell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you Focus, Gain 2 Block.

HollowMod:BrokenVessel.NAME: Broken Vessel
HollowMod:BrokenVessel.DESCRIPTION: When you take Damage from [#FFA200]Infection, Deal that same Damage to ALL Enemies as well.

HollowMod:Flukenest.NAME: Flukenest
HollowMod:Flukenest.DESCRIPTION: When you play a Spell, Deal !D! Damage to a random Enemy.

HollowMod:Grubsong.NAME: Grubsong
HollowMod:Grubsong.DESCRIPTION: The first time you take Damage each turn, Gain 1 Soul.
HollowMod:Grubsong.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first 2 times you take Damage each turn, Gain 1 Soul.

HollowMod:ShapeofUnn.NAME: Shape of Unn
HollowMod:ShapeofUnn.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card with Void or Focus, Place a [#00ECFF]Dash card in your Discard on top of your Draw Deck.
HollowMod:ShapeofUnn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you play a card with Void or Focus, Place any card in your Discard on top of your Draw Deck.

HollowMod:SoulShaman.NAME: Soul Shaman
HollowMod:SoulShaman.DESCRIPTION: When you attack with a Nail Card, Generate 1 Additional Soul
HollowMod:SoulShaman.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL When you attack with a Nail Card, Generate 1 Additional Soul.

HollowMod:ConfessorsAdvice.NAME: Confessor's Advice
HollowMod:ConfessorsAdvice.DESCRIPTION: Ally NL Play the top card of your deck, add a copy of it to your discard pile.
HollowMod:ConfessorsAdvice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ally NL Play the top card of your deck, add a copy of it to your hand.

HollowMod:CrystalDash.NAME: Crystal Dash
HollowMod:CrystalDash.DESCRIPTION: [#00ECFF]Dash NL Discard your hand and gain !B! Block for each card discarded. Exhaust.

HollowMod:DreamGate.NAME: Dream Gate
HollowMod:DreamGate.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, Retain !M! card at the end of this turn. Exhaust.
HollowMod:DreamGate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, Retain !M! cards at the end of this turn. Exhaust.

HollowMod:DreamNail.NAME: Dream Nail
HollowMod:DreamNail.DESCRIPTION: Fill your Soul Meter, Next turn begin with [E] NL You cannot play any more attacks this turn.
HollowMod:DreamNail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fill your Soul Meter, Next turn begin with [E][E] NL You cannot play any more attacks this turn.

HollowMod:DungDefendersAura.NAME: Dung Defender's Aura
HollowMod:DungDefendersAura.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, Any Enemy who attacks you this turn, Recieves !M! Poison .

HollowMod:EmbracetheVoid.NAME: Embrace the Void
HollowMod:EmbracetheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 [E] Less for each Void. Draw Cards until you draw a Void or draw 5 cards. Exhaust
HollowMod:EmbracetheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 [E] Less for each Void. Draw Cards until you draw a Void or draw 5 cards.

HollowMod:GrimmsGift.NAME: Grimm's Gift
HollowMod:GrimmsGift.DESCRIPTION: Ally NL Each time you damagean enemy this turn, apply Vulnerable 1 to a them.

HollowMod:KingsBrand.NAME: King's Brand
HollowMod:KingsBrand.DESCRIPTION: Each Nail Attack played this turn Generates 1 Additional Soul

HollowMod:LifebloodHeart.NAME: Lifeblood Heart
HollowMod:LifebloodHeart.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Health, If you take no unblocked Damage this Turn, Repeat this effect next Turn. Exhaust.

HollowMod:MonarchWings.NAME: Monarch Wings
HollowMod:MonarchWings.DESCRIPTION: For the next !M! [#00ECFF]Dash cards played: Play them again. Exhaust.

HollowMod:Overcharmed.NAME: Overcharmed
HollowMod:Overcharmed.DESCRIPTION: Focus X: Lose !M! HP. Gain X Strength until the end of the turn.

HollowMod:PaleKingsBlessing.NAME: Pale King's Blessing
HollowMod:PaleKingsBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Exhaust 2 Cards. Gain !M! Soul. Gain 1 [E]. Exhaust.

HollowMod:PerfectDash.NAME: Perfect Dash
HollowMod:PerfectDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#00ECFF]Dash NL Gain 1 Intangible. Gain !B! Block. Exhaust.

HollowMod:SporeShroom.NAME: Spore Shroom
HollowMod:SporeShroom.DESCRIPTION: Focus 2: Exhaust up to 3 Cards. Heal 1 HP and Apply 1 Poison to all enemies for each Card Exhausted. Exhaust.

HollowMod:WhiteLadysBlessing.NAME: White Lady's Blessing
HollowMod:WhiteLadysBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Focus !M!: Heal 3, Draw 2 Cards. Discard 1 Card. Exhaust.

HollowMod:AwokenDreamNail.NAME: Awoken Dream Nail
HollowMod:AwokenDreamNail.DESCRIPTION: Nail NL Deal !D! Damage. Gain !M! Soul. Increase the Soul Meter Limit by 1 for this combat

HollowMod:HornetsHelp.NAME: Hornet's Help
HollowMod:HornetsHelp.DESCRIPTION: Ally NL Deal X damage to a random enemy X times and gain X block.
HollowMod:HornetsHelp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ally NL Deal X+1 damage to a random enemy X+1 times and gain X+1 block.

HollowMod:MantisClaw.NAME: Mantis Claw
HollowMod:MantisClaw.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 3 Cards in your hand. Draw 1 Card and Deal !D! Damage to a single enemy for each card Exhausted. Exhaust.

HollowMod:ZotesMagnificence.NAME: Zote's Magnificence
HollowMod:ZotesMagnificence.DESCRIPTION: Ally NL Deal !D! Damage. The enemy captures !M! gold. Exhaust

HollowMod:ElderbugsWisdon.NAME: Elderbug's Wisdom
HollowMod:ElderbugsWisdon.DESCRIPTION: Ally NL Any Ally cards gain Retain.

HollowMod:LordofShades.NAME: Lord of Shades
HollowMod:LordofShades.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Void !M!: While Void is Active: 50% of all Block you gain is instead gained as Thorn. All Thorn is reduced by half at the end of each turn.

HollowMod:SharpenedShadows.NAME: Sharpened Shadows
HollowMod:SharpenedShadows.DESCRIPTION: While you have Void: Playing a [#00ECFF]Dash Card will deal !D! Damage to a random enemy.

HollowMod:SlysStrikes.NAME: Sly's Strikes
HollowMod:SlysStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Ally, Ethereal NL Gain 1 Strength at the beginning of each turn.
HollowMod:SlysStrikes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ally NL Gain 1 Strength at the beginning of each turn.

HollowMod:SoulMaster.NAME: Soul Master
HollowMod:SoulMaster.DESCRIPTION: Spell Cards cost 1 less focus. NL Playing Void Spells Deals 1 Damage to all enemies.
HollowMod:SoulMaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Spell Cards cost 1 less focus. NL Playing Void Spells Deals 1 Damage to all enemies.

HollowMod:SoulVessel.NAME: Soul Vessel
HollowMod:SoulVessel.DESCRIPTION: Increase the Soul Meter Limit by !M!.

HollowMod:WeaverSong.NAME: Weaversong
HollowMod:WeaverSong.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Play a Card: Deal !D! to a random enemy.

HollowMod:Hiveblood.NAME: Hiveblood
HollowMod:Hiveblood.DESCRIPTION: Focus X: Gain half that amount as Regen (Rounded Up). Exhaust.

HollowMod:LifebloodCore.NAME: Lifeblood Core
HollowMod:LifebloodCore.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Gain 1 Temporary HP for each current point of Block. Lose all Block. Exhaust
HollowMod:LifebloodCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Temporary HP for each current point of Block. Lose all Block. Exhaust

HollowMod:RadiancesLament.NAME: Readiance's Lament
HollowMod:RadiancesLament.DESCRIPTION: Return all Infection cards from your discard to your hand. Cards played this turn cost 1 [E] Less and are Exhausted.
HollowMod:RadiancesLament.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return all Infection cards from your Discard and Exhaust Pile to your hand. Cards played this turn cost 1 [E] Less and are Exhausted.

HollowMod:SiblingsSouls.NAME: Sibling's Souls
HollowMod:SiblingsSouls.DESCRIPTION: Spell NL Focus 3: Add a Copy of the most recently played Non-Spell attack or skill card to your hand.

HollowMod:theNailsmith.NAME: The Nailsmith
HollowMod:theNailsmith.DESCRIPTION: Ally NL Each Time a Non Spell attack is used this turn: Upgrade it for the rest of the combat.

HollowMod:VoidDash.NAME: Void Dash
HollowMod:VoidDash.DESCRIPTION: Dash NL Void 1: Gain !B! Block, Deal !D! Damage to an enemy each time they attack you this turn

HollowMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
HollowMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

HollowMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
HollowMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

HollowMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
HollowMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

HollowMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
HollowMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal damage total.)
